attributes.action: Realize that GCSE program is floored and does fail students who are ill!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I’m a 16 year old student in Hertfordshire and have not attended school properly for 5 months, why? Because I have a psychological issue that makes me literally terrified of the building and the people iv had some home tuition but I probably wont be able to sit my GCSE’s and my dreams of gong to sixth form are shattered. The point to this petition is to get those in office to understand students who are ill and doing GCSE’s do not always get the best help and support.

rejection.details: You need to re-draft this with a much clearer call-to-action as the title
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
